welcome_message_body: Welcome to Givatayim, a charming city known for its vibrant arts scene and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sde Dov Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sde Dov Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a login is required.
